mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION ( NUM, CNUM, RNUM, ID, CHECKINDATE, CHECKOUTDATE, REGDATE, GUESTS, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, REQUESTED, TOTALPRICE, STATUS ) values( RESERVSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{cnum} , #{rnum} , #{id} , #{checkindate}, #{checkoutdate}, SYSDATE, #{guests}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{requested}, #{totalprice}, #{status} )
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY T1.NUM DESC, T1.REGDATE DESC) AS ROW_NUM, T1.NUM, T1.ID, TO_CHAR(T1.CHECKINDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CHECKINDATE, TO_CHAR(T1.CHECKOUTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CHECKOUTDATE, TO_CHAR(T1.REGDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REGDATE, T1.GUESTS, T1.NAME, T1.PHONE, T1.EMAIL, T1.REQUESTED, T1.TOTALPRICE, T1.STATUS, T2.NUM AS CAMPING_NUM, T2.NAME AS CAMPING_NAME, T2.CAMP_TYPE, T2.THEMECODE, T2.IMGURL AS CAMPING_IMGURL, T2.POSTCODE, T2.ADDRESS1 || ' ' || T2.ADDRESS2 || ' ' || T2.ADDRESS3 || ' ' || T2.ADDRESS4 AS ADDR, T2.CONTACT, T3.NAME AS ROOM_NAME, T3.NUM AS ROOM_NUM, T3.ROOM_TYPE, T3.IMGURL AS ROOM_IMG, T3.PROPGUESTS, T3.MAXGUESTS, T3.WEEKDAYPRICE, T3.WEEKENDPRICE, T3.OPTIONS, T3.AMENITY FROM RESERVATION T1, CAMPING T2, ROOM T3 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.ID= #{id} AND T1.CNUM = T2.NUM AND T1.RNUM = T3.NUM AND T2.NUM = T3.CNUM AND T1.NUM = #{num}
